caption: This song features a marimba playing a melody on the higher register. The marimba plays a repetitive melody. This is accompanied by a clarinet and flute playing a dissonant chord together. This song is relaxing. It has a dreamy sound. This song can be played at the beginning of a dream sequence in a children's animation movie.
